CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "Domestic Parcels"),ISPICKVAL( Cover_Type__c , "Transit Cover")), "4540", IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "Domestic Parcels"),ISPICKVAL( Cover_Type__c , "Extra Cover")), "4540", IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "Domestic Letters"),ISPICKVAL( Cover_Type__c , "Transit Cover")), "4540", IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "Domestic Letters"),ISPICKVAL( Cover_Type__c , "Extra Cover")), "4540",
IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "International Parcels"),ISPICKVAL( Cover_Type__c , "Transit Cover")), "4545", IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "International Parcels"),ISPICKVAL( Cover_Type__c , "Extra Cover")), "4545", IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "International Letters"),ISPICKVAL( Cover_Type__c , "Transit Cover")), "4545", IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "International Letters"),ISPICKVAL( Cover_Type__c , "Extra Cover")), "4545",
IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "International Parcels"),ISPICKVAL( Case__r.ProductSubCategory__c , "ECI")), "4545", IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "International Parcels"),ISPICKVAL( Case__r.ProductSubCategory__c , "Express Post International")), "4545", IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "International Letters"),ISPICKVAL( Case__r.ProductSubCategory__c , "ECI")), "4545", IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Case__r.ProductCategory__c, "International Letters"),ISPICKVAL( Case__r.ProductSubCategory__c , "Express Post International")), "4545",
"4155"))))))))))))
CustomField.label: GLACCT
